subject: Hockey, Ice
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: The Canadiens’ Carey Price, who grew up in a small mountain town 200 miles from the nearest indoor rink, is expected to become Canada’s starting Olympic goalie.
snippet: The Canadiens’ Carey Price, who grew up in a small mountain town 200 miles from the nearest indoor rink, is expected to become Canada’s starting Olympic goalie.
